name: iP.1 Contact Form
author: iP.1 Networks AB

sections.description:
The plugin is built to complement other iP.1 services. iP.1 delivers a wide variety of communication services that allows you to send SMS, surveys or emails to your contacts.

To use the plugin you need to first register an account. You can register an account on the following page. New account.
When the account is active you need to set up an API key to paste in the token field in the plugin. You can create your API key in the Portal.
If everything is set up correctly contacts that are added in the form should appear in the Contact app and be ready to use in our services.

1.0.0

  • Fixed bugs
  • Added styling
  • Added styling customization guidelines and examples
  • Added phone number validation and formatting help

1.0.0-alpha.1

  • Initial version
  • Added contact form
  • Added configuration section

description:
The plugin is built to complement other iP.1 services. iP.1 delivers a wide variety of communication services that allows you to send SMS, surveys or emails to your contacts.

To use the plugin you need to first register an account. You can register an account on the following page. New account.
When the account is active you need to set up an API key to paste in the token field in the plugin. You can create your API key in the Portal.
If everything is set up correctly contacts that are added in the form should appear in the Contact app and be ready to use in our services.
